plot: The long-awaited reunion concert of the renowned pop music duo, more than a decade after their separation as musical performers.
title: Simon and Garfunkel: The Concert in Central Park
plot_es: The long-awaited reunion concert of the renowned pop music duo, more than a decade after their separation as musical performers.
original_name: Simon and Garfunkel: The Concert in Central Park
plot_en: The long-awaited reunion concert of the renowned pop music duo, more than a decade after their separation as musical performers.
